titles.title: Regarding the payment of interest with respect to certain reliquidated entries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay interest, using a specified formula, on the aggregate amount of the duties that were paid with respect to entries of certain tubular tin products reliquidated on November 14, 1988, under the Omnibus Trade and Competitiveness Act of 1988.
